item.title: Brandie add a quote by Lisa Wingate
item.description: "Sometimes we must try to view the actions of those around us with forgiveness. We must realize that they are going on the only road they can see. Sometimes we cannot raise our chins and see eye to eye, so we must bow our heads and have faith in one another." -- Lisa Wingate

item.title: Brandie add a quote by Lisa See
item.description: "For my entire life I longed for love. I knew it was not right for me — as a girl and later as a woman — to want or expect it, but I did, and this unjustified desire has been at the root of every problem I have experienced in my life." -- Lisa See
